arts.ttl: Napoli midfielder Lobotka discusses ‘special’ clash against Milan: “Many strong players”
arts.sum: By: Isak Möller Stanislav Lobotka, the Napoli midfielder, has shared his thoughts on tonight’s game against AC Milan with the media.
